entity.name: Good Morning Britain
entity.description: Good morning, Britain. Up early and need to catch up on the latest news, weather and sports? Then this weekday morning programme is for you, offering the latest information in such areas as entertainment, health and money. `Good Morning Britain' is the typical morning news and talk show. It features a number of presenters, correspondents and reporters covering what you should know to start your day before heading out the door.

urls.title: "A Conversation with Emma Howard Boyd, Chair of the Environment Agency"
urls.description: Join Miranda Barker, CEO of East Lancashire Chamber of Commerce in conversation with Emma Howard Boyd, Chair of the Environment Agency.

text:
There's still time to book your place to join us online on Monday (12th April) 11:00 ‚Äì 12:30 for a conversation with @EmmaHowardBoyd, Chair of the @EnvAgency. For more details and to book your free place click below üëá
#environment #environmentagency https://t.co/ir6kZvX7PU
RT @RachSalv: @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids Someone will be in touch shortly

@bettwsresident @RossCherrington @EnvAgencySW @SoilsAlliance Yes it is important.
But risky fields such as this one with winter veg can be manageable. This slope was deep chisel ploughed after harvest, and left rough.  It would have been similar to the bottom headland if not managed.  Surprising how stable that bare clay loam soil can be! https://t.co/zWeacuDInd
